website_summaries.verdict: A moderately supportive, relatively lightweight running shoe.
pros: Comes in White, Gray, Hi-Res Orange and Noble Indigo
Lace-up closure, foam insole, rubber outsole
cons: Can be larger than buyers anticipated

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Absolutey love these sneakers! I've been wearing them the past few weeks at the gym and they are so comfortable. I have a bad/weak ankle ( broke it 2x when i was young). Usually it gets tired and sore shortly into my workout. Also I am able to workout longer because my calves and feet don't hurt. Plus mine are pink and black 😀
customer_reviews.author: Greyestfox

customer_reviews.title: Deeply disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have been running in Adidas for maybe 15 years. They are my shoe. This pair, I'm not even sure they are a legitimate pair of Adidas. If they are, they are not as described. I am a neutral pronator wiht a high arch, I don't need stability or motion control, i just need good cushion. The sole of these shoes is stiff, not bouncy at all. I've never had knee issues and in the 3 months i've been wearing these, i've developed persistent knee pain. I'm regretfully going to buy another pair even though i cannot afford to do so. i think these are bad for my health.
customer_reviews.author: LizLemon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE ADIDAS ENERGY BOOST SHOES FOR WOMEN!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I currently have 9 pairs of these shoes and I've thrown away 2 pairs. Do I need to say more? I have a wide toe area with a very narrow heel, and a small foot...size 5 or 6. Shoes are almost impossible for me to find; however, this is the perfect shoe to accommodate my small foot. I highly recommend these shoes if you need a good running shoe that has a wide toe area and narrow heel.
customer_reviews.author: CDB

customer_reviews.title: Excelent!
customer_reviews.text: At the beginning they feel a little uncomfortable. I use them to run more than 10kms, little by little they have adapted to the shape of my foot, very good quality, excellent sole, the color is very vibrant, the material makes the feet transpire, good product!
customer_reviews.author: ARCIYIPI

customer_reviews.title: Get them and take them for a ride!
customer_reviews.text: This shoes are amazing!!! If you are debating if they are a go or no-go... stop thinking ! Get them and try them on. Fantastic stability and cushioning!
customer_reviews.author: michela ferluga

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is so off.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my normal size in this shoe- I have worn it for years. Got these in today and they are HUGE. I think they are men's?? Or something? The sizing is way, way off.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie C.

customer_reviews.title: sizing is not accurate
customer_reviews.text: These shoes run so BIG! They looked like clown shoes. I ordered my normal size 7 and they were huge!! I reordered in 6.5, the shoes arrived today and are still a half size to big. I will decide if I want to order a size 6 or give up. For reference I wear Nike Air Max Thea in size 7
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Fit great and feel great!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I use to wear Adidas Brevards but they no longer make them. I was heartbroken. I thought I would give these a try as I have tried a pair of boost before but not these ones. Well when I got them, I opened the box up immediately and tried them on. They fit great and feel great! I love that the front is a little wider so my toes are not cramped in there. Right after putting them on I started walking and running around - they didn’t even need to be broken in or anything. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Roxyblader23

customer_reviews.title: Really really comfy and springy!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted some comfy shoes for walking. I don't jog but I like to walk a lot. These shoes fit like a glove. Very bouncy. I love them. I paid $44 for them and was blown away when I saw them for sale a week after for $160!!!! Holy moly! I guess I got lucky. I recommend these Adidas to anyone, especially with wide feet like mine.
customer_reviews.author: DANO

customer_reviews.title: Adidas for the win!
customer_reviews.text: I put hundreds of miles on the shoes and they held up well! I love to run in Adidas, I've lost count of how many I've owned now. The Continental tread lasts, the toe box is wide enough, and they never gave me trouble with shin splints. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ccmike21

customer_reviews.title: The size you Order may run large.
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of 9.5 Adidas Energy Boost that are about 4yrs old and have served me well. So I bought these having loved my precious pair so much. Unfortunately even though I ordered the exact same 9.5 this pair actually had my foot swimming in the shoe. It fits like a size 10 and not a true 9.5. I wish now I ordered a half size smaller. I checked to see if perhaps I ordered the male shoes by accident but no it says women’s on the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faithful Adidas Boost customer
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of this exact shoe, but I have been in Boost shoes fro Adidas for 5+ years and I will never go back to anything else. The show is narrow in the heel and roomy in the toe box. I have a neutral foot, so if you do probate or supinate you might need to swap out the insole. Switching to the Continental Tire tread solved the wear issue they had for so long, these shoes hold up really well with high mileage runners.
customer_reviews.author: Tory F.

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what Adidas did with the design of this shoe since my last pair but they are too tight across the arch. I've never encountered this issue before. I don't have wide feet. I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Bebop Fan

customer_reviews.title: Toe room! Nice shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Soft, cushioned shoe. So happy they fit out of the box. I have other Adidas running shoes. These fit larger or longer than the others. I would not necessarily size down but consider based on how your shoes typically fit. I have a wide foot and happy for some toe space.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica K.

customer_reviews.title: Finally a shoe that allows the forefoot room to expand ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally a shoe that allows the forefoot room to expand while running! Shoe laces stay tied and no need to break them in.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn F.

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I'm on my feet a lot during the day at work. Walk at least 4 miles a day. I also play volleyball for at least 4 hours a week and these keep my feet from getting sore.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Lehner

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Love then. They do run a bit big but not a big issue. Like them so much getting a second pair. They were selling these “on sale” for $119 at our local running store.
customer_reviews.author: Tuxedo Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great if u have a leg problem
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shoe. Wear them everyday..buy 2 pair a year so I do not wear same pair all the time. Fits like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: From box to feet to walk in 5 mins
customer_reviews.text: Love love these shoes! Look great and are very comfortable. My foot can be squeezed into women’s regular, sometimes i Buy men’s shoe for a more comfortable fit. Not this time! This shoe was perfect out of box
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Love these sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: After switching brands of running sneakers for two years due to my running store no longer selling the boost...I'm finally back in them through Amazon and couldn't be happier! They fit perfectly for my feet. I am a 6 1/2 with just a slight wide width and very high arches. They feel awesome when running and my feet don't hurt!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go half size down
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable. I always wear size 8 in athletic shoes but with this one I had to return the 8 and order a 7.5 pair and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Normaliz Melendez

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.text: This pair of shoes fits well and comfortable. The only concern I have is that, since my feet is a little bit wider, so it is tighter as I expect. I Like it loose though, but so far it gives me the right fit.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: and this are the most comfortable sneakers I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I am usually 5 1/2 in normal shoes but I always buy 6 in sport shoes. I have back and knee problems, and this are the most comfortable sneakers I've ever had. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: NRE

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Service was great. This color fit larger than my gray Energy boosts; they may have been from different seasons
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: awesome fit
customer_reviews.text: i broke my foot twice last year and this shoe was great today! my foot didnt swell or ache like normal... price was great.. package was delayed but only by a day.. once again i am happy
customer_reviews.author: kimberly ann

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Another great running shoe from adidas. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bissell

customer_reviews.title: They are great and very light but kindive narrow around the metatarsal ...
customer_reviews.text: They are great and very light but kindive narrow around the metatarsal area of the foot and caused incessant rubbing.... But other than that....I love these to death!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ran

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes I have, along with my Nike Pegasus 35's. These are great shoes! I have them in gray too!
customer_reviews.author: Dems59

customer_reviews.title: So sad sandy
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this same shoe many times before but the last time the quality has seemed to have gone down. I’ve worn them about 90 days and already the toe box is popping thru. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: NOT HAPPY

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe
customer_reviews.text: The absence of stitching makes this a very comfortable running shoe for someone who has bunions.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Rooney

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable running shoes - true to size.
customer_reviews.text: Love these running shoes! I have bought rhwm several times - good cushion for long or short runs.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine M Langhorst

customer_reviews.title: Way too big!!!
customer_reviews.text: I should’ve listened to the reviews. They run really big. They’re the size on men’s 11.
customer_reviews.author: J. Badon

customer_reviews.title: Extremely stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are high quality and are extremely comfortable. I recently purchased them for my trip to Paris and averaged 8-15 miles a day and they were the absolute best! My feet were never sore! Will definitely purchase another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Todd

customer_reviews.title: Normally a great shoe...
customer_reviews.text: There is a piece of the Adidas logo on the side of the show that rubs horribly on the foot. Can’t wear these and will return.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Walker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes; stylish, very comfortable. Excellent running shoes for the neutral runner at a great price on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Moret

customer_reviews.title: The shoe fits my foot. However, it is ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits my foot. However, it is heavy and I work 12 hour shifts, so after 8 hours or so, my feet are throbbing and my legs are more tired than they usually are. Very durable shoe, though.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Love the traction...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and great traction on road, gravel, and grass. Plenty of room in the toe-box. I always add arch supports, so I do not know how the shoes are without.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Haley

customer_reviews.title: Runs too large
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe but runs too large. Should go by European sizing since American is incorrect. I wear a 9 in American and I need an 8 for this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Natasa Vukadinovic

customer_reviews.title: Discontinued
customer_reviews.text: This is discontinued. Sad to see it go. Hopefully the new line that replaced this is better.
customer_reviews.author: Mingyu H

customer_reviews.title: Good for on your feet all day shoe
customer_reviews.text: Basic Addias tennis shoe. I used these for my nursing clinical since I’m on my feet most of the day. Very supportive
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy it again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.text: Great color and a timeless running shoe. This is my 7th pair since I started running years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes and the price. Great durability and very comfortable at an unbeatable price!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: But the left one is good; )
customer_reviews.text: May have gotten a default pair. I haven't been able to wear them because the right shoe always hurts my foot. But the left one is good ;)
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Springer

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: Got my regular size 8.5... it was too big. Highly recommend getting a half size smaller. Great quality running shoe
customer_reviews.author: Karla bracamonte

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as my old Adidas Energy Boost
customer_reviews.text: not as comfortable as the old version. causing some foot pain
customer_reviews.author: Angela Price

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I had Ultra Boost before these. A bit more structured but an Adidas Fan all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: Product was poorly manufactured. Lack of quality impact comfortable running.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: super comfortable, and people keep telling me how nice my shoes are! That never happens....
customer_reviews.author: kimberly olivas

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and fit just like my old energy boost
customer_reviews.author: Edward D Harper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had real sneakers in a long time. This is fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Adidas BB3458 Energy Boost Women's Running Shoes
product_meta.description: These women's running shoes combine responsive cushioning with plenty of ground feel for a ride charged with an endless supply of light energy. A sock-like stretchy upper hugs your foot for a seamless, flexible fit, and the heel design supports a natural, comfortable stride.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
Runner type: neutral; Weight: 9.5 ounces (size 7); Midsole drop: 10 mm (heel: 32 mm / forefoot: 22 mm)
boost is our most responsive cushioning ever: The more energy you give, the more you get
4-way engineered stretch mesh upper provides flexibility and breathability; techfit upper is engineered for natural, flexible support and a seamless, sock-like fit

TORSION SYSTEM between the heel and forefoot offers a stable ride; TPU cage integrated into external heel counter for best fit in midfoot and heel; FITCOUNTER molded heel counter provides a natural fit that allows optimal movement of the Achilles
STRETCHWEB rubber outsole flexes underfoot for an energized ride
